extendedInfo.description: xWriter 4 is one of a kind - powerful editor enables users to write customizable multi-page notes.It is simple, clean, neatly organized, lightweight, yet powerful word processor designed for both tablets and phones.POWERFUL EDITORWork with smooth scrolling pages with font, keyboard, and many other options!EXPORT AND SHARE SEAMLESSLYThe app supports browser for My notes, SD card, External SD card, My Document, and Box - copy and paste among storages seamlessly.INTUITIVE INTERFACEAlmost every edit options can be changed in the editor â no switching back and forth to settings screen. For fast navigation and operation, on-screen toolbars are provided.GET ORGANIZEDOrganize documents in your own way. Make different styles of folders and move your notes, or you can make copy of your notes.SECURE YOUR DATAThe app offers backup and restore feature. Use password protection to keep your note safe.Some of the xWriter features include:1) Browse and edit from My Notes, SD card, External SD card, My Document, and Box2) Folder - create unlimited depth of folders, you can delete/rename folders and move notes to folder3) Folder style - 9 different folder styles to choose from4) Search notes - search your notes in specific folder5) Share document6) Export as txt or pdf7) PDF export options - page size(A4, A3, etc), page margins (narrow, wide, etc), print page number, text color, background color, password encryption and moreEditor1) Fast touch interaction through its own gesture engine2) Toolbar for save, select all, cut, copy, paste, undo/redo, page up/down/begin/end, and page next/prev/first/last3) Unique background, font, text size, page margin, and line spacing settings for each note4) 10+ different note styles to choose from5) Pages - add pages to your note and flip pages by swipe gesture or toolbar buttons6) Page thumbnail view and manipulation - insert/delete/merge/add pages7) undo & redo8) Text search - search for characters up/down with case sensitive search option9) Fonts â in addition to sans serif, monospace, and serif, it supports arial, courier, times, georgia, and verdana only if installed in your device10) Keyboard - capitalize all/sentence/word options, and enable suggestions11) Auto save - choose to save automatically or not12) Word Count13) Text selection (double tap or long press to select a word)14) Insert page, delete page, insert page break, merge pagesItâs is compatible with android devices with version 2.2+ including tablets and phones such as Samsung Galaxy Tab, Galaxy Note, Asus Transformer, Acer Picasso, Acer Iconia, Galaxy Nexus, Galaxy S2, S3, S4, Optimus G Pro, etc.

reviews.title: What can I say
reviews.comment: I give a five star rating once in a \"century\" and so this is the second 5 star I give whether purchased or not.   The 5 star is of course because the app is working, but also due to outstanding support, which 0- to 1 out of 10 developers offer. How do you send flowers? :-)
reviews.author: Yasemin Nielsen

reviews.title: Nearly exactly what I wanted
reviews.comment: If this app had the ability to choose different fonts and font styles I.e. bold/italics/underline etc. I would gladly pay $5 or more. Great little app.
reviews.author: Tim Donk

reviews.title: Useful
reviews.comment: good app, I dont lose my files and great for uni note taking. runs well on inexpensive tablet and at a resonable price
reviews.author: Ryan Lynn

reviews.title: Nexus 7 Box integration issue still not resolved?
reviews.comment: A simple word processor and great value. Thanks. Not a fan of the update. (31/5/13),  preferred the wood panel background and Box crashes App on Nexus 7. Not the app I purchased. :-(
reviews.author: Jamie O\'Neill

reviews.title: Fantastic app
reviews.comment: I enjoy all of the features that a lot of similar apps, surprisingly, do not have.
reviews.author: Dan Brockwell

reviews.title: Wicked app
reviews.comment: Love this app to bits, however I must say I prefer the old wooden panel background and the leather and more professional looking folders- the new ones look cartoonish, would love the option to view the old way. Other than that brilliant update (:
reviews.author: Cat Neal

reviews.title: New UI
reviews.comment: Not a fan of the new UI, it looks cheap and kinda messy so I wish there was an option to view it the old way. Aside from that its a great app.
reviews.author: Jasmine Jansen

reviews.title: Reliable; best combo of Handy Features
reviews.comment: Using this for > 3 wks and the note taking & folder organizing & Dropbox combo is GR8 for my typical purposes. =RECOMMENDED= unique note app [General Tip: Always keep a text format document for editing,  Export a PDF version when needed.]  (Phone User Tip: I use the condensed view seen in the 2nd-to-last preview: better for small screens than the larger manila folders view)
reviews.author: Vector Keene

reviews.title: All i wanted was a paste function
reviews.comment: The only reason i PAID for this app is i thought it had a paste option to paste text from your phones clipboard to the document, no such luck. Withoit that feature to me the app is worthless.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: LOVE IT!
reviews.comment: I tried a few other apps before this, all, to NO avail, whether they were to complicated or just weren\'t professional, i simply must say, this app is perfect for amateur writers or professional, folder covers really were a nice touch. This app is helping me greatly in my story writing. Two questions though. 1. Why no spell check? 2. Can you add a feature to make a book cover with your own images on the notes itself, because many people are using this for books. Keep the folder covers and good work!
reviews.author: Michelle Lutchman

reviews.title: Xwriter
reviews.comment: Once save a file as PDF You cant re-open & edit via Xwriter. Can only be opened by Adobe. This sux. Must find another app to do what i require. Waste of money
reviews.author: Vic V

reviews.title: Help!!!
reviews.comment: I just purchased your word product I had written a long document in the free version before realizing you have to purchase a version to save it as PDF or text ....now I have a document in the free version and I have paid for the application... but I can\'t figure out how to get the first document created into the new version so that I can save it as text to PDF ...please help I\'ve spent literally hours on this project!!!
reviews.author: Linda Muldoon

reviews.title: Best out there.
reviews.comment: At first I thought it didn\'t support my keyboard\'s predictions, but I found the setting for that so now all is well. No problems pasting things from other sources as there\'s an icon above the page for that. Looking forward to updates (crosses fingers for rich text and more folder and page colors).
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Just what I needed
reviews.comment: Let\'s be realistic, for a tablet you\'re not looking for a full word processor. I wouldn\'t use this to write a resume, but it\'s great for short speeches and school presentations.  All the other apps made me feel like Goldie locks , this one\'s too heavy or this one\'s too light. The only thing I would add is the ability to underline or italicize.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Finally found what I was looking for except....
reviews.comment: Great app.  Been looking for something to replace Daedalus or writings for ages and finally found this. The best writing app that allows organising whole chapters, articles, research  etc into separate themeable  compartments.  The only limitation is that somehow the  predictive text we get on most android keyboards is disabled which might be a deal breaker for some since it  slows  down fast corrective  typing. FIX THIS and you will have a killer app. GREAT WORK.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: A bit of an eager rating but cannot fault this app yet...
reviews.comment: Havn\'t spent much time with the app just yet but its the most customizable word processor out there at a budget price. Lovely treat to use with nice folder covers for each project makes it more personal.  EDIT: Major issues with horizontal typing On small devices such as the S3 toolbar needs to be removable as digi keyboard clashes with it blocking actual type...meaning horizontal typing is near impossible.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Better than most
reviews.comment: I used a Apple iPod Touch for three years and then an iPad. They were nice but as we all learn Apple is a closed culture. An then I bought a Xoom and installed xwriter. Marvelous and very stable. Reminds me of \"Write\" or \"WrireRoom\"  This software is stable, does not crash and looks great. The interface takes a couple of days to figure out but that\'s to be expected. Uploading to DropBox is a plus. Fonts and page colors are superior to most such programs. With office pro and Documents to go, you have a generic white page and that\'s it. xWriter allows your personality to come through. The folder setup is simple and easy to operate.  Overall xWriter is the better choice for Android, strong, safe, effective and easy to operate.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: The Best!
reviews.comment: This is the best word processing app I have EVER used on an Android device, and I have tried them all. Please add the ability to move the app to the SD card. 5 stars all the way.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: A very simple and easy app to use. The best word processing app on the market.
reviews.author: A Google User
